metadata.title: CVE-2024-27076 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: media:imx: csc/scaler: fix v4l2_ctrl_handler memory leak Free the memoryallocated in v4l2_ctrl_handler_init on release.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
